meanings.definition: A type of plant with trailing stems and round leaves.
meanings.sent1: The dichondras in the hanging basket look beautiful.
meanings.sent2: I planted some dichondras in my garden for ground cover.
meanings.sent3: The dichondras in the garden seem to be dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back like the trailing dichondras.
meanings.sent5: The dichondras' round leaves shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'dichondra'.
meanings.sent1: We have many dichondras in our backyard.
meanings.sent2: The dichondras in the park are well-maintained.
meanings.sent3: The dichondras at the nursery are having a party.
meanings.sent4: The dichondras in the field whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The dichondras' colors blended together beautifully.
